bibl.title: A Transportation Archive from Fourth-Century Oxyrhynchus (P. Mich. XX).
bibl.note: P. Mich. XX, 800-826. - Pp. 5-7: K.A.W., Preface. - I. Introduction. - II. Method of publication. - III. Texts. - IV. Appendices: A. Similar undertakings by Oxyrhynchite town councillors to deliver wheat or barley to Pelusium / Alexandria from the Oxyrhynchus Papyri; - B. Miscellaneous early Byzantine Oxyrhynchite texts concerning transportation by ship. - V. Indices.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn P.J. † and Klaas A. Worp (Edited by), with the assistance of Traianos Gagos † and Arthur Verhoogt, A Transportation Archive from Fourth-Century Oxyrhynchus (P. Mich. XX). (American Studies in Papyrology. 49.)
Durham, North Carolina, American Society of Papyrologists (Diffusion: Oxbow Books), 2011, 8°, 235 pp. ISBN 978-0-9799758-3-7. $45.

P. Mich. XX, 800-826. - Pp. 5-7: K.A.W., Preface. - I. Introduction. - II. Method of publication. - III. Texts. - IV. Appendices: A. Similar undertakings by Oxyrhynchite town councillors to deliver wheat or barley to Pelusium / Alexandria from the Oxyrhynchus Papyri; - B. Miscellaneous early Byzantine Oxyrhynchite texts concerning transportation by ship. - V. Indices.
